list.name: COUNTER-CRUSH
list.description: When receiving damage, Jacky returns the favor by converting x% of the damage into a Groundbreaker counterattack.
list.descriptionHtml: When receiving damage, Jacky returns the favor by converting x% of the damage into a Groundbreaker counterattack.

list.name: HARDY-HARD-HAT
list.description: Jacky's Hard Hat protects her by reducing any damage she takes by x%.
list.descriptionHtml: Jacky's Hard Hat protects her by reducing any damage she takes by x%.
